name: Ouroban
description: The Ouroban is a formidable humanoid, clad in protective plate armor, wielding a greatsword and carrying a heavy crossbow, known for its fire-based abilities and intimidating presence.
memorable: The Ouroban can absorb fire damage to heal itself, making it a dangerous foe, especially in fiery combat situations.
goals: To dominate foes through intimidation and ruthless efficiency in combat, leveraging its spellcasting and fire abilities.
relations: Possibly serves dark powers or beings associated with fire and poison, and may be encountered alongside other evil entities.
environment: Typically found in shadowy locales or battlefields, areas infused with dark magic or fire.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength, robust spellcasting capabilities, and immunity to fire damage.
weaknesses: Limited speed and agility, with average dexterity affecting its maneuverability.
attacks: Three melee attacks with a greatsword delivering slashing and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Abyssal Fires allows the Ouroban to summon damaging and debilitating flames under its foes.
skills: Skilled in athletics and intimidation, showcasing its physical prowess and ability to intimidate others.
additional_information: Immune to fire damage and cannot be poisoned.
Uses necrotic damage in addition to its regular attacks after using its Devastate ability.
Has a variety of control spells, enhancing its presence in battle.
Fire Breath attack that can damage multiple targets.
A tactical spellcaster with potent area control abilities.
spellcasting: 14th-level spellcaster with a variety of paladin spells focused on healing, control, and fire damage.
test_queries: humanoid that uses necrotic and fire damage
